synopsis.text:
One step into the gritty streets of Chicago, and you'll find Rally Vincent and Minnie May Hopkins, the dynamic duo behind Gunsmith Cats, a firearms store with a questionable reputation. But their business is just the tip of the iceberg, as these two skilled bounty hunters moonlight to bring in the city's most dangerous criminals. Rally, a sharpshooter with an uncanny ability to assess firearms, teams up with the explosives-obsessed Minnie, creating an unstoppable force that leaves chaos in their wake.

When Bill Collins, an agent from the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives, coerces the pair into collaborating on a high-stakes case, Rally and Minnie find themselves in a world of gunfights, car chases, and mayhem. As they delve deeper into the secrets of the case, their unparalleled skills in gunmanship and explosives will be put to the ultimate test, pushing them to outperform everyone else to stay alive. Prepare for a thrilling ride filled with girls, guns, and grenades in this action-packed anime set in the urban jungle of Chicago.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
